attributes.action: Vote of No Confidence against Boris Johnson and the conservative party
attributes.additional_details: Following recent reports about the alleged party which took place at Downing Street last December, the government should be held accountable. How are we supposed to show alliance and support to a government who can’t even stick to their own rules!
attributes.background: The government must resign or call a general election

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments, which includes calling for Ministers or the Government to be sacked, resign, or to be subject to a recall vote or a vote of no confidence.
